summary.p: Cannot write more than this: Has not yet received any news about the war in Lower Germany; Emperor [Charles V] was recently still in Bonn, which is why Bucer is staying there longer; would like to know how [Diethelm] Röist judges his conversation with [Heinrich] Glarean, and asks for news about [the capture of the city of] Nice. Greetings. Bullinger should return the letter from [Petrus] Dasypodius.

div.p: Greetings. I could do nothing more than what you see. I have not yet received any news about the war in Lower Germany. The Emperor was recently still in Bonn, which is why Bucer is delayed. Glarean is said to have foolishly conversed with Röist; I would like to know what he would judge here. I would also like to know about Nice, which they call Nisa, if you have any information.
Basel, on the first day of September in the year 1543.
Return the letter from Dasypodius. Your Oswald Myconius.
